verses.verse: <S%H7181>Listen<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H7773>cry<s%>, my <S%H4428>King<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>: for unto you will I <S%H6419>pray<s%>.

My <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall you <S%H8085>hear<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> will I <S%H6186>direct<s%> my prayer unto <S%H6822>you<s%>, and will look up.
For you are not a <S%H410>God<s%> that has <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: neither shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> live with <S%H1481>you<s%>.
The <S%H1984>foolish<s%> shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>: you <S%H8130>hate<s%> all <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
You shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>falsehood<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8581>abhor<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

But as for <S%H935>me<s%>, I will come into your <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy<s%>: and in your <S%H3374>fear<s%> will I <S%H7812>worship<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.
<S%H5148>Lead<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, in your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> because of my <S%H8324>enemies<s%>; make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> before my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

For there is no <S%H3559>faithfulness<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; their <S%H7130>inward<s%> part is very <S%H1942>wickedness<s%>; their <S%H1627>throat<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>tomb<s%>; they <S%H2505>flatter<s%> with their <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

<S%H816>Destroy<s%> you <S%H430>them<s%>, O God; let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> by their own <S%H4156>counsels<s%>; cast them <S%H5080>out<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; for they have rebelled against <S%H4784>you<s%>.

But let all those that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>: let them <S%H5769>ever<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%>, because you <S%H5526>defend<s%> <S%H157>them<s%>: let them also that love your <S%H8034>name<s%> be joyful in <S%H5970>you<s%>.
For <S%H3068>you<s%>, Lord, will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; with <S%H7522>favor<s%> will you <S%H5849>compass<s%> him as with a <S%H6793>shield<s%>.
